html:
12.18.21  10:57 pm   How do all your songs have that one line that is really relatable for no reason?
I.E. "i wonder about my neighbors even though i dont have them" or "deep in the city, the buildings wonder if theyll ever be built".

      i have a reason

12.18.21  9:07 pm   What are your thoughts on memes

      too strong

12.18.21  4:28 pm   do you think santa is exploitative to their elfs?

      those are fictional, but the scenario does play out in real life

12.18.21  3:31 pm   if you existed 100 years ago without access to any technology from today, how do you think you would go about making the stuff you do? 

      i'd surely get a band together, do shows, make some records, maybe write some pamphlets to go with the records. or maybe i would find myself writing for the theater

12.18.21  2:05 pm   What would you do if you were given the chance to live a life on earth?

      freak the heck out, apparently

12.18.21  2:03 pm   why in the here comes the sun video did you use quotation marks for the word "nobody"? 

      maybe open up some "possibilities"

12.18.21  10:39 am   would you sample a bee hive and use it?

      how about using the actual bee hive

12.18.21  2:14 am   Do you view life as more of a web of possible outcomes decided by our decisions and as such decisions should be carefully made and considered or do you feel it's more of a passive thing in which our decisions set us on a trajectory and all we can truly do to influence the future is make slight alterations to that trajectory?

      there's got to be some middle ground

12.18.21  1:20 am   do you think it is a good idea to learn a stringed instrument by learning how to play two strings, then three strings, and so on until you can play all the strings?

      yes, that sounds fine with me

12.18.21  12:40 am   to the high schoolers having to analyze your work 50 years from now what do you have to say to them? 

      HI HOW ARE YOU

12.17.21  11:56 pm   is the reason song production has been taking longer than it has in the past because you've made some kind of breakthrough?

      absolutely not

12.17.21  10:29 pm   why is it so warm

      to compete, with coldness

12.17.21  5:56 pm   How do you find the time to answer all the questions here!?

      how about doing them all right now

12.17.21  5:31 pm   what are your thoughts on a piano

      very friendly. the friendship instrument

12.17.21  3:20 pm   how many tries did it take to pull off that sick mic swing in hello sexy pants

      1

12.17.21  12:51 pm   how to use a chair?

      stand on it, to become taller

12.17.21  12:11 pm   when do I start?

      i think you already did

12.17.21  12:00 pm   what is your best one-liner

      hi

12.17.21  11:15 am   why does queue have 4 silent letters in a row

      to blow your mind

12.17.21  9:37 am   why do all the boys in congress get mad? is it because of the world?

      it's like sports. they have to be mad at each other, or else the game doesn't work and it would be a useless franchise

12.17.21  6:30 am   how do you get insperation for your songs?

      it's everywhere

12.17.21  2:33 am   hello, can you reveal to us your biggest weakness?

      sure. my brain is so loud it chokes itself

12.17.21  1:03 am   How every does it get? 

      how much can you handle

12.16.21  10:23 pm   why are you so cool?

      it's a fallback, in case everything else goes wrong

12.16.21  10:12 pm   what is your mic for music recording?

      i use one of the regular ones

12.16.21  8:05 pm   best way to make a sandwich?

      place 1 sandwich between 2 non-sandwiches. that's a sandwich sandwich

12.16.21  7:26 pm   Please use a Hurdy Gurdy in your next song thank you

      that's not going to make things any better

12.16.21  6:27 pm   which of your songs would you say you like the least?

      i can't tell how much i like any of them

12.16.21  5:42 pm   thoughts on humanity

      very friendly

12.16.21  4:54 pm   what's your favorite game

      playing

12.16.21  4:09 pm   did you decide at any point during the writing / production of got to know what's going on that you only wanted to use the major scale

     absolutely not

     or did it just wholly shake out that way, unintentionally?

     i'm going through it in my mind to see if your thesis is even true. ah yes, i think there are some passing tones in the bass, for sure. so it's not true. but moreover there are no scales goals with me. the closest i ever came to a scales goal was this one time when a scalular riff idea/exercise infected my brain suddenly and i couldn't get it out of my head until i finished it

12.16.21  1:33 pm   What happened to those short videos you used to post? They've been gone since 2016 or so

      i just checked, they're still there

12.16.21  1:16 pm   whens the last time you watched a broadcast of a sporting event

      around 2008

12.16.21  12:58 pm   how to love everything

      you're going to have to love yourself

12.16.21  12:19 pm   what would you consider an acceptable height for going to the mall?

      shorter than the mall

12.16.21  10:39 am   why is that one part of at the airport terminal so darn catchy

      just in case

12.16.21  3:48 am   Do you like doing anagrams?

      yes

12.16.21  1:41 am   song plz im begging

      me too

12.16.21  12:49 am   how do you do it

      can't

12.15.21  10:25 pm   did you model the piano in here comes the sun

      yes

12.15.21  9:57 pm   so you think that rain in December shouldnt be possible?

      no

12.15.21  8:48 pm   I'm quite confused, especially as to what I'm confused about, got any advice?

      have you thought about going into a deep slumber

12.15.21  8:20 pm   have you ever thought of doing a fully a cappella song?

      yes, but i call that something different. i call it "vocal only"

12.15.21  8:15 pm   why don't you use capital letters

      i do, but why don't you

12.15.21  8:10 pm   how do you do things?

      combine them all into 1 thing and just do that

12.15.21  7:32 pm   are you recording yourself for the next video

      yes

12.15.21  12:17 pm   is there lore to this website?

      yes, i used to think i would use thousands of alternate identities, to cover all the breadth of different types of material i wanted to create, without them getting in the way of each other, and perhaps also as a way to escape from the pressure of having to own up to any particular one. but then i realized that this strategy doesn't play well with the confines of contiguous spacetime. so i finally had to just suck it up and admit i'm just 1 person, and that's when i made the website and put everything on it

12.15.21  10:28 am   What does your desktop wallpaper  look like?

      blank black

12.15.21  9:35 am   Forgive me if I'm wrong, but it seems like the song recording for your next song is taking much longer than previous songs.

     more than a dream took longer

       Like after about 2 months I figured you'd be working on the video part.  Is there any particular reason for this?

      i'm broken

12.15.21  4:55 am   how do you deal with it when you get stuck on something while doing a project and can't find a way forward?

      i don't know
